data.name: TumbleSeed - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
TumbleSeed's OST is the emotional backdrop of TumbleSeed's strange, mystical, dangerous, and wonderful journey up the mountain and beyond.

23 original tracks from the game and 2 remixes from the pre-release trailers as bonus tracks.

Tracklist:
1. Not Every Seed (1:43)
2. Prairie (3:25)
3. Secret of Seeds (1:14)
4. TumbleSeed (2:55)
5. Seed Band (1:54)
6. Forest (5:41)
7. Vineguard (1:47)
8. Home Seed Home (2:01)
9. Basecamp (0:40)
10. Jungle (4:11)
11. Chasms (2:14)
12. Ascension (2:00)
13. Desert (4:34)
14. Seed Shop (0:55)
15. Drum Circle (0:59)
16. Snow (3:12)
17. Cloud Shrine (1:46)
18. Summit (2:01)
19. Prophecy (2:09)
20. Descent (4:19)
21. Root Cause (2:28)
22. Temple (0:51)
23. Cure (4:46)
24. Prairie (Remix) (1:42)
25. Vineguard (Remix) (2:27)
Album Length: 61:54

All files are are formatted as 256kbps mp3
You can find the downloaded soundtrack in your Steam directory: ../Steam/SteamApps/common/TumbleSeed/TumbleSeed Original Soundtrack (or right-click on TumbleSeed, select Properties-> Local Files and click Browse Local Files)
